Documentation

A modern, Markdown-driven documentation engine. Write your docs in Markdown, and let the filesystem be your navigation.

Get Started View on GitHub

Filesystem Routing

Your folder structure becomes your navigation. Add files and folders to create new pages instantly.

Dark Mode

Toggle between light and dark themes. System preference detection included out of the box.

Markdown First

Write documentation in Markdown. No React or JavaScript knowledge required for content authors.

Static & Fast

Built with Astro for zero JavaScript by default. Lightning fast page loads with static generation.

Responsive Design

Mobile-friendly with a collapsible sidebar. Works beautifully on any device or screen size.

Tailwind CSS

Styled with Tailwind CSS for easy customization. Extend the design to match your brand.
